This trainer only works on freemode and party mode online (and its a mod not cheating) but i only use trainer as for making maps or defence against noobs who would use there trainers to kill me (trainers are not cheats or hacks) They are a tool to make game play more fun (but some players do abuse others with these tools) so get a trainer and turn godmode on and they cant bother you no more (thats my rant over with) happy gaming to all (and yes i know i cant spell)  lol

Please note that this trainer is now out dated and no longer working (please go to my web page as mentioned in my other comments) this is free to use and you only need to fill in a membership form to download the latest trainer (please note that as a member of this site you will be sent an e-mail as soon as an updated trainer is avalible for download)
